content: this beaded purse pattern is a great opportunity for learning how to add beads to crochet if you have never incorporated beads into your crochet before you are in for a treat make sure you watch the included tutorial so you re comfortable getting started then grab your supplies and let s get to work for a tutorial on how to add the beads in crochet head over here https //hearthookhome com/3-ways-to-add-beads-to-crochet/ **finished dimensions ** full size approx 7 5″ wide x 10″ tall credit card wallet approx 4″ wide x 3″ tall curio #3 crochet thread whisker colorway pictured -approx 1 ball for full size purse -less than 1 ball for credit card wallet seed beads 6/0 -3 tubes for full size purse -1 tube for credit card wallet
